title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.22 - 11/11/2015
body: On 11/11/15, starting at 05:00 Sydney Time (18:00 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.22. At 06:30 Sydney Time (19:30 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

replies.body:
To be honest, Roit has now released the worst update yet, it all seems so wierd and alien, the prices on items is all wrong. They have made the masteries too simple and less to choose between. And the fact that they no longer have manapots or the fact that healthpots is just ridiculous. Thank you for taking time to read this.

If u share my opinion please copy and paste, if u dont write with your own words on how this new update is.

Ahhh damm! Wanted to play one more game in the uni library before people started coming in to study! Now I have to do work, thanks guys! 

No but for reals, awesome, can't wait. I am just about to read through the patch notes now!! :) Keep up the awesome and hard work!! :D

EDIT: Even though it isn't much, I am glad to see Ezreal in the update.
EDIT 2: Damm, that took me a while to read through that, looks like I have a lot of planning ahead of me.
